item.title: Jail glitch need help
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok on my 508 if a player has a sara pot he can kill himself and he will spawn where people die. how do i block this? and where.

i have guessed 2 ways just need help with the codes.

  1. if p.player uses itemid(“sarapot”) && (jailed = False)) ;
    delete item (“sarapot”);
    Add hp (99)

  2. making it so u cant die in jail.
    if player jailed ();
    cantdie()

… i would need the voide code tho.

Read full topic
